official_title: Resolution to authorize Benjamin R. Fern, Chief Counsel of the Select Committee on Standards and Conduct, to appear as a witness in the case of Common Cause, et al., against E. T. Klassen et al.

summary.text: Authorizes Benjamin R. Fern, Chief Counsel of the Select Committee on Standards and Conduct, to appear as a witness in the case of Common Cause, et. al., against E. T. Klassen et. al.
